timeline_sequence.event: FNB declines meeting - cites mandate (4:51 PM)

key_revelation.quote: The current mandate states that any of the directors of the company may act independently of each other.
key_revelation.source: Mpumi Netshipale, FNB Business Relationship Manager
implications: Each director has independent authority to act on the account
FNB cannot be held liable for following the mandate
Directors must pass a resolution to change this arrangement
